Description: This auction is for a previously owned 2003: Epiphone Lynyrd Skynyrd 30th Anniversary Les Paul Goldtop and the matching Gig bag. The guitar is in very good shape except for a crack I believe is in the finish at one of the knobs "see photo". Overall condition is good the knobs all function although they are a little scratchy, the finish is in good shape has normal light scratches from use the neck is nice and straight.The 30th Anniversary Lynyrd Skynyrd Les Paul Goldtop from Epiphone commemorates three decades of the legendary Southern rock band Lynyrd Skynyrd. The limited edition guitar is based on the classic Les Paul Goldtop but with a twist: the 30th Anniversary guitar has a Lynyrd Skynyrd Metallic Gold finish on top and the official emblem from band’s 30th anniversary tour on the back. Features of the 30th Anniversary Goldtop include maple top and mahogany back, rosewood fingerboard with Lynyrd Skynyrd pearloid inlay, two ’57 Classic Alnico-V pickups, vintage “green key” tuners and chrome-plated hardware. Title: 2003: Epiphone Lynyrd Skynyrd 30th Anniversary Goldtop Les Paul
ConditionDescription: In very good shape has a crack at one of the knobs "see photo"
